import React from 'react'; const SecurityApproach = () => { return (

Our Approach To Security & An Open Non-Authoritive Marketplace & More About Hacking!

Hacking is the practice of breaking into computers and networks to steal information. It has become an international problem that threatens businesses, governments, and individuals. The term hacker has negative connotations and is often misused to refer to a group of teenage computer geeks who cracked the systems of major companies. It was in this context that the term "hacker" became associated with negative intent. In addition to gaining access to private data, hackers may also steal sensitive financial information, login credentials, and other data.
Today, hacking has become an international billion-dollar business. Many amateur hackers -- known as "script kiddies" - buy turnkey tools to hack into IT systems. One such store on the dark web offers remote access to IT systems for $10. Once an attacker has access to a system, he can steal information, disrupt the system, or install malware like ransomware. Another website offers tips on undetectable logins and how to circumvent security measures.
While large companies are the target of most hacking attacks, hackers are not limited to large enterprise networks. They can compromise personal devices, including smartwatches, wearables, and mobile phones. They also use keylogging malware to gather data such as passwords, credit card account numbers, and Social Security numbers. Phishing involves sending fraudulent emails and voicemails. Once they have obtained this information, they use the information to spread malware or spread viruses.

  • Secure by Design

    Our platform utilizes best practices in not only code but network security as well assuring your account will be safe from bad-actors & your funds will be available when you want them

  • Compliant by Design

    PCI payment complient as well as KYC (know your customer) compliance as well regarding the identity verification process/flow. Know EXACTLY who you're trusting/working with.

  • Continuous Monitoring & Support 24/7

    Continous monitoring & support for ALL of our customers whether you're a hacker or looking to hire hacker's, we have your back til the end!
